name: benchmark-agentic-codeact-run
description: Run a single benchmark case using a CodeAct-style LLM/tool loop (VisualFlow llm_call + tool_calls) and score correctness + tool-use metrics.

pinDefaults.system_prompt: You are an autonomous tool-using agent. Use tools, be truthful, and finish the task.

data.label: Compute case_dir/case_id

inputs.label: value
inputs.description: JSON value (or JSON-ish string) to stringify.

inputs.label: mode
inputs.description: Rendering mode: none | beautify | minified. Default beautify.

data.label: Build loop prompt
data.code:
def transform(_input):
    task_prompt = str(_input.get("task_prompt") or "").strip()
    steps_json = str(_input.get("steps_json") or "[]")
    idx = _input.get("index")
    try:
        i = int(float(idx))
    except Exception:
        i = 0

    prompt = (
        task_prompt
        + "\n\n"
        + "Loop iteration: " + str(i) + "\n"
        + "PREVIOUS_STEPS_JSON (minified):\n" + steps_json + "\n\n"
        + "Decide the next action.\n"
        + "- If you need more information, call tools (batch independent tool calls when possible).\n"
        + "- If you have enough information, return the final JSON answer (you can include extra text; it will be formatted).\n"
    )
    return prompt

data.label: Normalize LLM output
Build step (tool)
Build step (final)
data.code:
def transform(_input):
    idx = _input.get("index")
    try:
        i = int(float(idx))
    except Exception:
        i = 0

    response = _input.get("response")
    resp = "" if response is None else str(response)

    step = {
        "index": int(i),
        "assistant_response": resp,
        "tool_calls": [],
        "tool_results": [],
        "tool_success": None,
        "done": True,
    }
    return step

data.label: Select raw_answer
Build formatter prompt
data.code:
def transform(_input):
    case_id = str(_input.get("case_id") or "").strip()
    raw_answer = str(_input.get("raw_answer") or "").strip()
    prompt = (
        "Convert the following agent answer into JSON matching the required schema. "
        "Return JSON only (no markdown, no extra keys).\n\n"
        + "case_id: " + case_id + "\n\n"
        + "Answer:\n" + raw_answer
    )
    return prompt

pinDefaults.system: You are a strict JSON formatter. Output only valid JSON. Do not add commentary.

data.label: Evaluate + Build Record
